controller

Class InformationSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.InformationSystem

  • public final class InformationSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class that handle the managment of statistics
    Author:
    Ron Cohen

      • getRangeSumStatistics

        public static Statistic getRangeSumStatistics(java.lang.Integer cityId,
                                              java.sql.Date from,
                                              java.sql.Date end)
        Calc and return a "sum" of all the statistic in the date range and have the city id.
        Parameters:
        cityId - the city id, can be null to request all cities id
        from - date range from
        end - date range to
        Returns:
        the statistic "sum" of all the statistics in range
